summary:
Georgetown University is a historic Catholic university in Washington, D.C. Founded in 1789, it's the oldest Catholic university in the U.S. and the first federally chartered university. The school has 11 different colleges and is known for its research and selective admissions. 

It's home to the famous Healy Hall and has around 17,500 students from over 135 countries. The university's sports teams, the Hoyas, are part of the Big East Conference. Many famous people, including two U.S. Presidents, have graduated from Georgetown.
title: Georgetown University
